author: swagata87
body: Currently, the variable nMatchedStations is set to zero. And number of valid muon hits is accessed in a way that it always returns zero. As these 2 variables will be essential for the analysis that we plan to do using the dimuon scouting data, so I changed the code in a way that these variables returns meaningful value and save that in the event.
title: fix muon hit related info
